title: Eldritch Blast
content:
Eldritch Blast Evocation Cantrip 1~10 Damage 1d10Force Conjure a beam of crackling energy. 18m Attack Roll Action

Evocation Cantrip

Conjure a beam of crackling energy.

Eldritch Blast is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Eldritch Blast is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Eldritch Blast Information

Description: Conjure a beam of crackling energy. Level: Ca
